[\[1b.1\]{D1401}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sA d+ha na ni dA na shrI tsakra sam+ba ra nA ma pany+tsi kA_/bod skad du/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' '+rel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[1b.2\]]dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mgon po sku gsum bde ba'i bdag_/he ru ka dpal la btud de/_/bla ma brgyud rim las 'ongs pa/_/dad pas cung zad bri bar bya/_/de nas zhes bya ba
[\[1b.3\]]la sogs pa ni/_rgyud 'di rgyud gzhan gyi mtha' dang yang dag par ldan pa ste/_de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sngon gyi rgyud la ltos pa yin no/_/'dis ni rgyud 'di bar chad med par gsal bar byed do/_/gang
[\[1b.4\]]gi phyir 'bum phrag gsum pa zhes bya bar 'di skad bdag gis zhes gsungs te/_de nyid kyis na dang po gleng gzhi'i tshig rab tu sbyor ba med de sngon rab tu sbyar ba'i phyir/_rgyud ces bya ba ni rab tu 'brel pa ste/_
[\[1b.5\]]rgyu'i rgyud dang thabs kyi rgyud dang 'bras bu'i rgyud do/_/rgyu'i rgyud ni rigs te 'dir shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i sgrub pa po nyid do/_/thabs kyi rgyud ces bya ba ni/_sngon du dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i rim pas
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]sgom pa dang /_bzlas pa dang /_gtor ma dang /_'khrul 'khor dang /_sngags kyi rab tu sbyor ba la sogs pa'o/_/'bras bu'i rgyud ces bya ba ni gnyis su med pa gsal ba gcig tu gnas pa ste/_ngag gi spyod yul
[\[2a.2\]]ma yin pa dang /_sems kyi yul las ring ba nyid do/_/rab tu 'brel ba de ji lta bu zhe na/_gang 'dir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gnas pa'o zhes bya ba'i don te/_'di'i phyag rgya ni yi ge a'o/_/as sdom pas na yi ge thams
[\[2a.3\]]cad a las byung ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las kyang /_snying ga'i dbus na mi shigs pa/_/rab tu 'bar ba mar me bzhin/_/mi 'gyur mchog tu phra ba yi/_/a ni gtso bo dam pa'o/_/zhes
[\[2a.4\]]gsungs pa dang /_yang brtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis pa las/_lte bar phyag rgya chen po gnas/_/'bar ba mar me'i rtse lta bu/_/dbyangs yig dang po'i rang bzhin te/_/blo zhes sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtag_/ces
[\[2a.5\]]gsungs so/_/de phyir zhes bya ba ni/_yi ge a las bshad pa thams cad 'byung ba'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro/_/de gang zhe na/_gsang ba zhes bya ba la 'di'i rigs rnams gsal bar ma byas pa'o/_/gsal bar ma byas pa de ci zhe na/_
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]sbas pa bdun te/_de nyid gsal bar bshad pa ste/_gsang ba de nyid yul dang ni/_/gsang ba rgyal po'i 'khor lo'o/_/gsang ba sbas pa bden pa ste/_/gsang ba gsang ba'i pad+ma ste/_/gsang ba sa bon gyis dga' ba/_/gsang ba thams cad 'dus pa ste/_/gsang ba bar chad
[\[2b.2\]]med bde ba'o/_/zhes so/_/mdor bsdus pa'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag par bsdu pa ste gzhung gi tshad la bya'o/_/don ni ma yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de nyid ni sdom pa ste/_sdom pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad 'dzin zhes bya ba'i don no/_/dpal
[\[2b.3\]]he ru ka yang dag sbyor/_/zhes bya ba ni/_dpal he ru ka ni bdag nyid do/_/rdo rje phag mo ni phyag rgya ste/_de dag gi yang dag par sbyor ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid do/_/'dod par bya bas na 'dod pa ste/_'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/'dis sangs rgyas nyid dang rdo rje 'dzin pa
[\[2b.4\]]nyid sgrub par byed pas na 'dod pa'i don kun nas sgrub par byed pa'o/_/de gang zhe na/_bla ma las kyang bla ma ste/_/zhes bya ba la bla ma'i don gsungs te/_sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa'i bsam pa'i dbye ba'i dbang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba dag par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi phung po brgyad
[\[2b.5\]]khri bzhi stong dag bstan to/_/de las kyang bla mar gyur pa nyid snying la gnas pa'i de kho na nyid bla na med pa ste/_rdo rje can dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis so so rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin nyid tshig gi lam las 'das pa nyid do/_/de nyid kyis na/_bskal pa bye ba brgyar
[\[2b.6\]]yang ni/_/de nyid dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom/_/zhes bya ba ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gsungs te/_de ni nam mkhar 'gro ma'o/_/yi ge e ar 'gyur ro/_/'gro bas na DA ste/_nam mkhar 'gro ba
[\[2b.7\]]zhes bya ba'i don to/_/DA zhes bya ba'i sgra la gsungs pa'o/_/a ka ni gya gyur 'gro ba ste/_'dir thams cad du 'gro ba ni gya gyur 'gro ba'o/_/des na nam mkhar 'gro ba'i ngang tshul 'di la yod pas na mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ste/_bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sku'i rdzu 'phrul gyis thams
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]cad du cig car 'gro bas zhes bya ba'i don no/_/de rnams kyi dra ba ste/_tshogs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/sdom pa ni bde ba'i mchog ste/_de rnams kyi lhan cig tu skad cig re re la bde bas yang dag par tshim pa'i phyir ro/_/gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
[\[3a.2\]]stong pa nyid bcu drug gi rang bzhin gyi brda'i yi ge ste/_thams cad kyi sgra ni de rnams gsungs pa yin no/_/ra ni mtshal chen po yi khams/_/ha ni ri las skyes pa ste/_/ri skyes zhes pa mgo skyes so/_/sa ni dri yi snod yin te/_/lus la dri ni ji lta bar/_/sa ni rlung du gsungs pa ste/_/
[\[3a.3\]]ra ni dri nyid yin par gsungs/_/yi ge me ni me tog ste/_/ra ni de bzhin lan tshwa'o/_/me ni sha chen por 'dod de/_/sa ni rab tu sbyor ba nyid/_/rba ni mgo bor rab tu gsungs/_/lha mo me ni rkang yin te/_/ni ni dri yi mar khu'o/_/sa ni so dang sen mo ste/_/da ni rgya mtsho las skyes so/_/
[\[3a.4\]]s+thi ni kha ba'i snying po ste/_/ta ni ga pur bstan pa'o/_/yang na/_/gcig tu thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_/kun du 'gro ba shin tu phra/_/snying gi gsang chogs mnyam pa ste/_/sgyu ma'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid/_/sems kyi rang bzhin bsam mi khyab/_/yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba bzhin/_/
[\[3a.5\]]shes rab ming du de brjod do/_/gsang ba zhes kyang bshad pa yin/_/mchog ni don dam nyid kyis te/_/chos kyi sku zhes de brjod do/_/lhag mthong kun mkhyen ye shes kyi/_/dgyes pa zhes ni bshad pa yin/_/bsam gyis mi khyab brtan pa dang /_/g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad
[\[3a.6\]]kyi_/rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa yi/_/dga' ba rab tu 'bar bde'o/_/thams cad bdag nyid ces bya ni/_/dbang po kun dang rnam shes sems/_/thams cad nas ni thams cad du/_/yid kyi rnam shes zhes bshad cing /_/shes rab blo gros blor yang brjod/_/rtag tu zhes
[\[3a.7\]]bya ba ni/_/'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs dang /_/da lta'i bdag nyid can gyi mchog_/'di yis skye dang 'jig spangs 'di/_/khyab nyid rdo rje'i sku nyid de/_/dbang du byed cing rtag shar nyid/_/dus kun can nyid bshad pa yin/_/bzhugs zhes bya ba la/_kun nas sems can thams cad kyi/_/
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]khams kun la ni thams cad du/_/lus kun la ni mnyam khyab par/_/sems kyi rgyun nyid yang dag gnas/_/zag pa med cing bsam mi khyab/_/dri ma med cing bdag gis med/_/rang nyid stong pa mkha' mnyam pas/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs/_/thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/_/
[\[3b.2\]]chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug sku/_/kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin pas na/_/bden pa gnyis la yang dag brten/_/ji ltar shing la rab brten pa/_/me yi sa bon rnam gnas dang /_/ji ltar til gyi 'bru rnams la/_/til gyi mar khu de ltar ni/_/khams gsum la ni rnam gnas pa/_/phyag rgya chen
[\[3b.3\]]por shes par bya/_/zhes bya bar dgongs so/_/mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkha' 'gro ma kun gyi sgras ni rab tu gtum mo la sogs par 'dod la/_de rnams kyi phra rab yongs su bsgrubs pas na/_de rnams kyi dngos kyi rang bzhin no/_/de su zhig ce na/_sems
[\[3b.4\]]dpa' zhes bya ste/_rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i bye brag gi gnyis so/_/sems can rgyu ba zhes bshad la/_/snod kyi 'jig rten mi rgyu ba'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba mchog_/ces bya ba la/_mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste/_rdo rje dang chos mthun pas gzhan rnams 'bigs pa'i phyir
[\[3b.5\]]ro/_/de bas na sems dpa' ste/_dngos bo thams cad gcig tu gyur pa nyid do/_/rdo rje yang yin la sems dpa' yang yin pas rdo rje sems dpa' ste/_dngos bde dngos po med pa bde/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar brjod/_/'di ni zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba ste/_de nyid bcom ldan rang 'byung
[\[3b.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_brtan pa dang g.yo ba dang grol ba ma lus pa rnams rang 'byung bas na/_rang 'byung bcom ldan no/_/'di la bcom pa yod pas na bcom ldan te/_bcom pa'i sgras dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams pa drug gzung ngo /_/yang na 'joms pas na bcom zhes gzung ste/_nyon mongs pa'i
[\[3b.7\]]bdud la sogs pa bcom pa'i phyir ro/_/de yang nyon mongs shes rab kyis 'joms pas/_de'i phyir shes rab kyis 'joms zhes gsungs so/_/nyon mongs pa dang bral bas na dpa' ba'o/_/rtsa yi 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis bsdams pas na/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom pa ste/_/bde
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]mchog sdom pa 'khor lo'i yin par bshad/_/ces so/_/yang na bla ma las kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bla ma ni khams bcu drug yin la/_de las kyang bla mar gyur pa ni mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/_/de rnams kyi tshogs ni dra ba ste/_de rnams nyid rtsa ba'i
[\[4a.2\]]'khor lo'i tshul gyis bsdams pas na sdom pa ste/_shin tu yang sbas pa'i gleng gzhi'i tshig gsal bar bya ba'i phyir/_ji ltar 'byung ba gsungs pa la/_gsang ba zhes pa ni 'di skad do/_/mchog ni bdag gis so/_/dgyes pa ni thos pas so/_/thams cad bdag nyid du ni gsum
[\[4a.3\]]pa'i don gyis bdun pa ste/_gzhan dang gzhan gyis ma yin no zhes pa'i don no/_/dus nam gyi tshe zhe na/_rtag tu bzhugs pa'i tshe na'o/_/gang du zhe na/_bde ba chen po'i gnas su'o/_/de yang gang zhig ce na/_'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/_/zhes bya bar sbyar ro/_/yang na/_
[\[4a.4\]]gsang pas yi khams yin te/_/de bzhin mchog ni chu yin la/_/dgyes pa me zhes rnam par bshad/_/thams cad bdag nyid rtag 'gro ba/_/rtag tu bzhugs pa nam mkha'i khams/_/zhes so/_/gang yang sems can gyi khams thams cad ni mkha' 'gro ma kun gyi rang
[\[4a.5\]]bzhin te/_de nyid rdo rje sems dpa'o/_/bde ba ni bde ba chen po ste/_mchog ni phul du byung ba'o/_/ji lta bur gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad do zhes bya bar sbyar ro/_/'byung zhes bya ba la/_/sa ni bde ba ste/_de'i chags pa chen po'i rjes su dpag par bya ba'i phyir 'byung
[\[4a.6\]]ba'o/_/de bas na sgra'i tshul la zhes pa ste/_rdo rje nor bu'i nang du chud pa'i hUM gi sgra'i tshul nges par byung ba ni dus gsum dang khams gsum pa'i ma lus pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'o/_/de rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'dus par 'dod pa ste/_rdo rje dang pad+ma lhan cig tu mnyam par sbyor ba'i phyir ro/_/
[\[4a.7\]]yul dang dbang po bcu gnyis po rnams kyis nye bar longs spyod pa ni spyod pa ste/_so so rang gis rig pa'i tshul gyis rang gi sems kyi spyod yul thob pa'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni spyod yul lo/_/thog ma ni gsang ba la sgrib pa lnga spangs shing /_nam mkha' ltar dag pa dbus dang
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]mtha' dri ma med pa shin tu gnas pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'khrul pa tsam zhig gzhom par bya'o/_/gzhan du na rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/bsrub bya bsrub bya'i sbyor ba bzhin/_/de bzhin zhes bya ba 'di lta ste/_gtsub gtan dang gtsub shing dang skyes bu'i lag pa'i
[\[4b.2\]]rtsol ba las du ba rab tu skye zhing me mngon par mched mod kyi/_me de yang gtsub shing la yang med gtsub gtan la yang med skyes bu'i lag pa dag la yang med yongs su brtags na gcig la'ang mi gnas so/_/me 'di ji lta ba bzhin du/_'dir yang /_bsrub bya'i chos 'byung rab tu
[\[4b.3\]]gsung /_/bsrub pa rdo rjer brjod pa'o/_/de yang dag par sbyor ba las/_de bzhin du bdud rtsi lta bu'i ye shes 'byung ba ni/_mngon par sangs rgyas pa nyid kyi byed pa po ste/_shes rab lus 'byung ye shes ni/_/mkha' mnyam thabs dang lhan cig nyid/_/bde chen rnam pa gcig
[\[4b.4\]]pu ni/_/yang dag dbang bskur las shes bya/_/sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan/_/rgyud 'di bshad kyis nyan par gyis/_/zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gsungs pa'o/_/rgyud kyi sgras ni 'dir rab tu brjod pa rdo rje'i nges pa'i tshig ma
[\[4b.5\]]lus pa rnams te/_de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'i don bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i don no/_/yid skyob par gyur pas na sngags te ye shes so/_/bsam gtan ni sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/yang na A li dang kA li'i
[\[4b.6\]]don ni sngags kyi bzlas par bshad la/_byang chub sems la rab brtson na/_/rnal 'byor dbang phyug rang nyid gtso/_/byang chub sems 'di rdo rje ste/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin no/_/dbugs 'byung bar ma mchog dag dang /_/zhes bya ba la dang por bcud kyi len gyi don du lo bcu gcig pa'i
[\[4b.7\]]bdag nyid pad+ma bskul ba'o/_/gnyis pa lo bcu gnyis pa dang /_dam tshig gi don du shin tu dga' bar bya'o/_/gsum pa lo bcu drug pa'i me tog dang ldan pa dang /_dngos grub kyi don du sngags la dang por goms par bya'o/_/bzhi pa lo nyi shu ma'i shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyis ni mkha' la spyod
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]pa sgrub par byed do/_/lnga pa lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'i bdag nyid kyis ni dbang bskur ba'i don du'o zhes bya ba'i bar du ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga rnam par dag pa'i rim pa bzhin du bstan to/_/dbugs 'byung zhes bya ba ni rang gtso bo'i lhas legs par sbyangs pa'i btsun
[\[5a.2\]]mo dang lhan cig spyod pa la rjes su 'jug pa'o/_/rigs ldan ni rigs kyi bu mo'o/_/med na gzhan yang gzung bar bya ste/_legs par 'dus pa la byang chub kyi sems gzhag par bya'o/_/dri zhes bya ba ni me tog sna tshogs la sogs pa dang /_gos dang rgyan la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyan par
[\[5a.3\]]bya'o/_/chus zhes bya ba ni chang rnam pa sna tshogs par shes par bya ste/_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan las skyes pa rnams la phan pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i sbyin pas mchod pa ste/_mchod pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pas sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag nyid mchog tu dga' ba'i skus phyogs bcu gsal
[\[5a.4\]]bar bya ste/_ye shes sgron mas mngon par byang chub par mdzad do/_/kyang gi sgras ni nges par shes par mdzad pa'i don no/_/rtag tu ni rgyun mi 'chad par de kho na nyid bsgom pa la gzhol ba'o/_/yang na dbugs dbyung ba zhes bya ba ni/_g.yon dang g.yas kyi dbugs gnyis snyoms par 'jug
[\[5a.5\]]pa'i dbugs de rnams lte ba'i rtsa bar yang dag par 'du ba'i dus su phyag rgya mi 'gyur ba'i mchog go/_/gang du bar ma mchog dang zhes bya ba'i tshig gzhan yod pa der brjod par bya ste/_dang po dang tha ma dag ste/_gzhon nu ma dang rgan mo dag gi bar du gyur pa'i rdul ni bar ma zhes bya'o/_/
[\[5a.6\]]bar ma mchog dang bsdus pa'i tshogs ni des mtshon pa'o/_/de nyid kyis na gsungs pa/_dri yi chu dang bcas pas kyang /_/zhes pa ste/_dri'i chu ni sih+la kaM ngo /_/de dang bcas pa ni ga pur te/_de lta bur gyur pas rigs ldan rnams la mchod par bya zhes so/_/dus kyi khyad par
[\[5a.7\]]gyis zhes bya ba la/_dus kyi nges pa bshad par bya ste/_de 'dod chags la sogs pas mi 'phrog par 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/_sngon du nyi ma'i dus las dus drug yang dag par gsal bar bya ste/_sog dang /_dbyar dang /_ston dang /_dgun dang /_dgun smad dang /_dpyid dang /_'dod
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]lhas mnyam du 'ong ba'i dus te/_dus rnams gsal bar shes par byas la/_las thams cad brtsam par bya'o/_/tho rangs dgun smad las 'ongs pa/_/dpyid dang dbyar gnyis nyin cha gnyis/_/nyin phyed sa gar mkhas pas sbyar/_/srod na de bzhin ston ka ste/_/dgun stod mtshan
[\[5b.2\]]mo'i cha yin no/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'di rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su shes par byas la/_rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dang sbyar bar bya ste/_rdo rje sems dpa' dgun smad de/_/rnam par snang mdzad thub pa dpyid/_/kye ho rta mchog so ga ste/_/de bzhin dbyar ni he ru ka_/_
[\[5b.3\]]rdo rje nyi ma ston ka la/_/pad+ma gar dbang dgun stod do/_/so ga mar me bza' bya ste/_/de bzhin du ni dbyar kha chu/_/ston gyi dus su mar khu ste/_/de bzhin dgun stod me tog go/_/kye ho dgun smad ga pur te/_/de bzhin dpyid ni bzhi mnyam mo/_/de rnams sman ni chen po ste/_/dus
[\[5b.4\]]drug dus ni shes par bya/_/dus tshod 'di dang mnyam med de/_/sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa yin/_/de dag rang bzhin grub pa ru/_/nam zhig rnal 'byor par 'gyur na/_/rnal 'byor ma kun mnyes 'gyur te/_/rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro 'dus pa'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/pho nya zhes bya ba
[\[5b.5\]]ni mchod pas mnyes par 'gyur ba rnams so/_/mchog dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar bstan pa rnams te/_des ni lhan cig gang skyes pa de yid ni nang du chud pa yis te/_bsgom par bya ba ni rtag tu de'i rang bzhin du bya ba'o/_/'dod pa'i dngos grub ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dngos grub
[\[5b.6\]]bo/_/ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'i sgra'i don no/_/rang rdzas ni ga pur ro/_/mchod par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o/_/sbrang rtsi ni sbrang rtsi chen po'o/_/khrag ni me tog go/_/ga pur bcas zhes bya ba ni ga pur dang lhan cig par yod pa'i me tog ste/_mi phyed
[\[5b.7\]]pa'i rim pas so/_/tsan+dan dmar po ni sha'o/_/sbyar zhes bya ba ni bshang ba la sogs pa dang bcas pas mnyam med drug po bcud kyis len no/_/rdo rje mtshan ma ni chos kyi 'byung gnas las byung ba'o/_/yang na thams cad rdo rje ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka yin la/_de'i mtshan
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]ma ni thod pa'o/_/'dzin pa ni de la rang gi lag pas blang bar bya ba ste/_ming med ni sa gzhir byas la/_mthe bo ni ri rab tu sbyar bar bya ba'o/_/rgya mtsho bsrubs pa'i bdud rtsi bzhin/_/rtog pa gsum du shes par bya/_/oM ha hoH hrIH'o/_/de la/_/ha zhes bya bas snyigs ma
[\[6a.2\]]'phrog_/yi ge hoHyis dre 'joms la/_/gang zhig me 'bar hrIHyig ste/_/pa ba ka zhes rab tu bsgrags/_/mkhas pas bsgrubs pa'i bdud rtsi myang /_/dang por bla mar dbul bya ste/_/de yi rjes su he ru ka_/_rdo rje can gyis sbyor dbul lo/_/phyag rgya la ni phul nas ni/_/bdag nyid
[\[6a.3\]]kyis ni yang dag myang /_/sbyor ba kun gyi snying po yis/_/bdud rtsi rnam pa ldar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur/_/yang na ga pur bcas pa ni/_/byang chub sems dang bcas pa'o/_/tshogs kyi dbus su gzhag par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[6a.4\]]mig la sogs pa dbang po thams cad kyi tshogs te/_grangs bdun par gyur pa dbang po gnyis kyi bye brag tu tshogs te de rnams 'dus pa'o/_/gnyis po de gang zhe na/_mthe bong srin lag rtse sbyar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste/_mthe bong ni rdo rje yin la/_srin lag ni pad+ma'o/_/de dag
[\[6a.5\]]gi sbyar ba ni mthe bong srin lag rtse sbyar ba'o/_/myang zhes bya ba ni rig par bya zhes bya ba'i don no/_/mchod bzhi de bzhin rnal 'byor ma/_/zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzhi yis te/_dang por stong pa'i byang chub po/_/gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu/_/gsum ba la ni gzugs brnyan rdzogs/_/

[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]nas bka' bkug ste/_de dag shin tu 'jigs pas myos nas rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis bar snang gi nam mkha' la song ste chu'i tshogs kyi rgyun 'thor bar byed do/_/yang na chu bo dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_lteng ka dang /_khron pa dang /_rdzing bu'i 'gram rnams su
[\[19b.2\]]rdo rje bya khyung gzi brjid chen bo'i gtso bo des klu rnams la bka' bsgo bar bsgoms la/_blo bzang pos khro bas 'khrug cing bzlas par bya ste/_pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa nyams dga' zhing lte ba dang ge sar gyi phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i dbus su/_rdo rje chen po mche ba gtsigs pas
[\[19b.3\]]'jigs pa dang bcas shing /_phyag brgyad pa zhal bzhi pa ste/_zhal dang po sprin gyi mdog lta bur sngo zhing khro ba dang bcas pa/_g.yas pa du ba lta bu g.yon pa sngo bsangs steng du bya khyung gi zhal shin tu dmar ba nyi ma bcu gnyis kyi 'od ltar gzi brjid rno ba mche ba gtsigs
[\[19b.4\]]shing 'jigs par mdzad pa'o/_/g.yas pas rdo rje mchog gsor ba dang /_g.yon pas sdigs mdzub mdzad cing zhags pa dang bcas pa dang /_gzhan gnyis kyis dbang po'i pags pa'i na bza' mnabs pa/_thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga_/lcags kyu dang ni mdung 'dzin zhing /_/brgyad
[\[19b.5\]]pa cang te'u ru ni 'dod/_/g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis gnon pa ni/_/chu bdag 'jigs pas brgyal bar 'gyur/_/zla phyed ral pa bcings pa la/_/sna tshogs rdo rjes nye bar brgyan/_/phyag rgya drug po sku la brgyan/_/mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/_/stag lpags kyi ni
[\[19b.6\]]sham thabs can/_/mche bas ma mchu sdebs mdzad cing /_/khro bo'i lta bas gzigs mdzad cing /_/'dab ma brgyad la klu'i rgyal po brgyad bri bar bya'o/_/shar phyogs su ni mtha' yas so/_/byang phyogs su ni nor rgyas bu'o/_/nub phyogs su ni pad+ma'o/_/dbang ldan du ni pad+ma chen
[\[19b.7\]]po'o/_/me mtshams su ni dung skyong ngo /_/srin por ni stobs kyi rgyu'o/_/rlung mtshams su ni ma dros pa ste/_dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang /_/ser dang dud ka skya ljang ser/_/rin chen ldan pa'i gdengs ka mtho/_/thal mo mchog tu sbyar byas nas/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]blta/_/'jigs pa'i sa ni bka' nod cing /_/skrag pa dang bcas blta bar bya/_/yang na phyag bcu gnyis pa'i bde ba chen po bsgom par bya ste/_sngon du bstan pa bzhin te/_chu bdag chung ma bcas pa mdog dkar po mnan pa'o/_/klu rnams dang chu bdag ni snying
[\[20a.2\]]gar hUM nAM hUM bri'o/_/bris sku la dmigs shing shar du bltas pas rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas par bya ste/_'bum gyis na mngon du gyur nas/_rdo rje khro bo bya khyung zhes bya ba'i gtso bo chen po'i bka' tsam gyis char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/oM aM anan+dA ya hUM nA hUM swA hA/_oM bAM bA su ki/_oM taM tak+Sha ka_
[\[20a.3\]]oM paM pad+ma/_oM maM ma hA pad+ma/_oM saM saM kha pA la/_oM ka karko Ta ma/_oM aM a na ba ta ba ta/_oM baM ba ru Na ya nA gA d+hi pa ta ye nA gA nAM baR+Sha pa ya hUM nAM hUM swA hA/_zhes bya ba ni thams cad blta bar bya'o/_/khro bo chen po sgom pas thams cad khri phrag tu bzlas pa dbul lo/_/mi smra bar gyur cing
[\[20a.4\]]shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas tshangs par spyod cing 'o ma dang /_sA lu'i 'bras chan bza' bar bya ste/_klu'i gtor ma dang ldan zhing /_'o mas khrus byas la 'o ma'i sbyin sreg dbul bar bya ste/_'o ma can gyi shing las skyes pa'i yam shing mtho gang pa dang lhan cig bsreg par byas la bum pa
[\[20a.5\]]'o mas bkang ste 'o ma dang bcas pa'i gtor ma phyogs bcur rab tu sbyin no/_/de lta bu'i tshogs mchod la/_dus bzhir stong phrag bzlas par bya ste/_zhag bdun gyis nges par sa gzhi thams cad du char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/yang na 'dir chu dang yungs kar dngul gyi snod du blugs
[\[20a.6\]]la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gdung dang bcas pa la/_dri chu dang /_'o mar bsres pas khrus byas la chu 'gram gnyis kyi sa gcig tu byas nas klu'i gzugs bya ste/_mgo dgu pa nub tu bltas ba gzhag go/_/de nas khrus byas la mchong de/_
[\[20a.7\]]de dang khrus kyi chur bcas pa chu klung du gtor bar bya'o/_/de ma thag tu klu rnams mgu nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du char rgyun mi 'chad pa 'bebs par 'gyur/_sa gzhi 'bru dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /_sems can thams cad bde ba'i reg pa'i gnas pas gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]'khrul 'khor gyi rab tu sbyor bar bya ste/_sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor las byung ba/_/gdengs ka'i dbang phyug 'khor lo'i ming /_/mchog tu rmad byung brtag pa yang /_/thos pa tsam gyis skrag byed na/_/ming dang bcas par bris pa yis/_/gdengs ka thams cad smos ci dgos/_/gro ga_
[\[20b.2\]]'am ni ras dkar la/_/'dab brgyad pad+ma bri bar bya/_/'khor lo gsum po rim ji bzhin/_/rdo rje pad+ma 'khor phreng bskor/_/dug dang lan tsha ske tshe dang /_/tsha ba gsum dang dur khrod sol/_/sna tshogs g.yon gyi skor phyogs su/_/shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa yis/_/shar la
[\[20b.3\]]sogs pa'i phyogs dang ni/_/dbang ldan phyogs kyi mtshams nas brtsam/_/ka ra ka ra la sogs pa'i/_/sngags 'di dag nas brtsams nas ni/_/rab gtum mo la sogs pa dang /_/brtson chen mtha' mar rab tu gnas/_/rang ming bcas par bri bya ste/_/hu hUM phaT dang sbyar
[\[20b.4\]]bar bya/_/oM ni thams cad gsal byed cing /_/grub sbyin 'dod pa thams cad gsal/_/'khor lo gsum gyis yongs bskor ba'i/_/rtsibs mchan mu khyud klu brgyad po/_/mtha' yas la sogs bri bar bya/_/'dab brgyad lte ba'i dbus su ni/_/hUM nAM hUM sarba nA ga baR+Sha
[\[20b.5\]]pa ya shI g+h+raM phaT/_dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol du/_/rin chen dang ldan gdengs gsum mtho'i/_/mjug ma phan tshun skye dkris bskor/_/de rnams kyi ni gdengs ka la/_/hUM nAM hUM ni rnam dgod bya/_/grog mo'i mkhar gyi sa dang ni/_/ba yi rnam lngar bcas pa yis/_/mtho gang
[\[20b.6\]]tsam pa'i nor rgyas kyi/_/gzugs brnyan byas la de yis ni/_/snying gar 'khor lo gzhug bya ste/_/dgug sogs byas nas yang dag mchod/_/ka ra bI ra'i lcug bkab ste/_/bar chad med par chus khrus bya/_/lan cig bzlas pa'i gu gul gyis/_/bdug pa rgyun mi
[\[20b.7\]]'chad par sbyar/_/gal te 'bab par ma gyur na/_/de ni nyi ma bdun pa la/_/dum bu dum bur byas nas su/_/bum pa'i nang du gzhug byas la/_/chu bo chen por bskur bar bya/_/de yis klu kun pham nas ni/_/'jigs dang bcas pas brgyal 'gyur te/_/chu yi tshogs ni 'bebs
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]par byed/_/lag pa g.yon pa la 'khor lo yid kyis bsams la/_ming dngos su bris nas lan cig bzlas pas ni dus su sbrul gyis zin pa slong bar byed do/_/lag pa bstan pa tsam gyis lha thams cad dang gnod sbyin thams cad dang srin po la sogs pa'i
[\[21a.2\]]gdon gyis gzir ba las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na/_kham phor so ni ma btang bar/_/dug la sogs pas bris byas pa/_/dkyil 'khor gsum po chu dag gis/_/'dab brgyud pad+mas mtshan pa yi/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa bris byas la/_/lte bar yi ge baM bris
[\[21a.3\]]nas/_/hUM gnyis kyis ni gzir bar bya/_/'dab brgyad la ni de bzhin du/_/klu brgyad snying po gzir ba bri/_/de nas sngags 'di gdab par bgyi/_/mtsho skyes kun du bskur bar bya/_/oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba laM/_ha na ha na pa tsa pa tsa bi d+h+wan+sa ya/_u ts+tsha Ta ya/_sarba Ni mA ra ya
[\[21a.4\]]hUM phaT/_de nas dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas yang dag par mchod de/_kha sbyar la klu'i sar gzhug ste/_gu gul dang sardza ra dang sgog skya bsres pa'i bdug pas bdug cing sngags bzlas na char 'bab po/_/zlog par byed do zhes bya ba ni bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor
[\[21a.5\]]bas so/_/yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa'i spyi bor phul ba'i me tog blangs la rtsa ba'i sngags lan bdun btab ste srin lag la bdugs na 'dis nam mkha' la char bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtsho skems par byed do zhes bya ba ni/_ji ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga dang /_sgom pa rgya
[\[21a.6\]]mtshor bung ba'i sngags pas shin tu khros pa'i gzi brjid chen pos skams par 'dir gdon mi za'o/_/kha dang kha la yongs su bzlas nas bsnun na chu bo rgyun las bzlog go/_/thog zlog par byed do zhes bya ba ni sdigs mdzub tsam gyis so/_/bzlas brjod 'bum byas pas
[\[21a.7\]]sa g.yo bar byed ces bya ba ni/_g.yas brkyang sbyor bas gar mdzad bzhin pa'i dga' ba dang bcas spro ba dang bcas pas mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo rab tu mgu bar byed do/_/shing la 'dzegs te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gang gi tshe sgrub pa po grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe thams cad
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]byed do zhes bya ba'o/_/gzugs brgya stong du ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/_phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang la gnas pas 'jig rten 'dir gang grub pa'i sangs rgyas de la lta ci smos so/_/snying rje chen po'i 'jug pa'i smon lam grub pa rnams ni dus rtag tu sems can ji ltar 'dul
[\[21b.2\]]ba'i dbang gis de dang de'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang brtson 'grus dman gyur pa/_/gang tshe sgrub po dngos grub 'dod/_/de tshe sngags dang rgyud kyis 'grub/_/sngags ni yid skyob ces grags pa/_/rgyud sman bzang po thabs chen thob/_/su la dngos grub
[\[21b.3\]]grub mi 'gyur/_/ma lus gzugs su sgyur bar byed/_/rang bzhin bsod nams dman pas kyang /_/tshogs pa rnams ni rnyed 'gyur na/_/rnam pa sna tshogs la sogs pa'i/_/sems can rnams ni chags bya'i phyir/_/bya ba rnams ni skyed par byed/_/dang po lha'i bdag nyid du
[\[21b.4\]]gyur par byas la/_phyi nas sa bon gyi dngos po grub ste/_ji lta bu'i sa bon la sogs pa yin zhe na shing gi tshogs kyis te/_e raN+Da dang smyo byed la sogs pa bshad pa dang de bzhin du sa bon rnams so/_/de dag la sogs pa yongs su smin pa rnams cho ga bzhin du sgrub par
[\[21b.5\]]byed de/_dkar po ma yin pa'i 'byung po'i nyi ma la rigs ngan gyi me tog gis bsgo zhing bdud rtsi lngas kyang mnyes la nyin mtshan de la skams te/_khyi nag po'i thod par dur khrod kyi sas bkang la/_mar ngo'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la ji ltar bstan pa'i ma mo'i gnas su bskyed nas
[\[21b.6\]]sgrub pa po'i sa bon blangs la/_sngags pas he ru ka dang bla ma mgon po khyad par du mchod pa byas la dur khrod du gtor mas mchod de/_mngon par bsngags la gang gi gzugs su bsams nas mgrin par bcings nas de'i gzugs su bsgyur te bkrol na slar yang rang gi gzugs
[\[21b.7\]]su 'gyur ro/_/yang gser shing gi sa bon blangs la zla ba mar ngo la sbrul nag po'i zhag gis byugs la/_mar ngo'i tshes brgyad dang /_bcu bzhi la khwa nag po'i thod par ji skad bstan pa'i gnas su mnyam par gzhag pas bskyed de/_smin ma'i sa bon blangs nas cho ga bzhin bya/_
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]ste/_gang yin pa'i gzugs su bsams nas mgrin pa bcings na de'i mod la sbed par 'gyur ro/_/dang por re zhig cho ga shes pas bram ze mchog gi rigs las byung ba'i gsal shing ngam mtshon gyis brgyab pa yang rung ste de'i thod pa blangs la/_grog mkhar
[\[22a.2\]]gyi sas bkang ste dgongs mo'i dus su dur khrod dam lam gyi bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dang chu bo'i 'gram rnams su sa bon bcug la chus gtor ba dang gtor ma sbyin pa dang nyi ma re re bsrung bar bya ste/_dpal he ru ka'i gzugs phyag rgya dang rgyan kun gyis brgyan pa/_kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa
[\[22a.3\]]lag pa g.yon pas 'dzin cing /_lag pa g.yas pas rde'u chung 'dzin pa'i spyod pa'i gzugs kyi brtul zhugs kyis bsrung bar bsams na sha za la sogs pa rnams kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur la gzhan du na mngon par 'gyur ro/_/sman bzang po rdzogs par bya ba la ni tshes dang
[\[22a.4\]]skar ma dang gza' bzang po la gzugs pa dang blang bar bya ste/_gang dang 'dra ba'i gzugs su byed par 'dod pa'i sngags pa mnyam par gzhag par byed de/_gang dang gang gi khrag gis 'bras bu rnams la mang du gtor zhing de'i sha la sogs pas byugs la de'i zhag gis
[\[22a.5\]]kyang mnye bar bya ste/_de'i thod pa ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin bskyed cing /_de'i zhag dang chu dang sha dang khrag gis gtor ma dang bdug pa dang byug pa la sogs pa nan tan du yang dang yang du byas la/_smin pa'i dus blang bar bya ste/_gcer bu spyi gtsug grol bas bu mo'i lag
[\[22a.6\]]pa g.yon par thod pa bzhag cing /_ci nas kyang 'bras bu sa la ma lhung bar gzung ngo /_/grub pa'i sa bon de bsgrims te blangs la cha gsum du byas la gcig ni bla ma rdo rje 'chang la dbul lo/_/gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma
[\[22a.7\]]rnams la dbul lo/_/gsum pa ni bdag nyid kyis bzung la/_khwa'i gdong pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor 'byung po'i ma mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas te khar bcug na rnal 'byor pa sna tshogs kyi rnam pa dang mtshungs par snang ste/_cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du nges par
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]de 'dra ba'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyor ba'i nus pa skyes bu thams cad du mi snang bar 'grub par 'gyur te/_sa bon gyi dam tshig 'grub pa'i cha tsam yang 'ug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mi mthong na sa la skyes pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_blo dang ldan
[\[22b.2\]]pas ji srid 'dod pa'i bar du mnyam par gzhag na lha'i bu mo rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod na kha nas bton na mthong zhing mi 'dod na mi mthong bar 'gyur te/_mi snang ba'i dbang phyug tu 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/khang bzangs dang shing gi rtse mo la sogs phye mar byed
[\[22b.3\]]do zhes bya ba ni/_/sngags kyi rgyal pos me 'bar ba'i/_sta gri bzhin du gtub par bya'o/_/lag pa g.yon pa zla ba'i 'od ltar dri ma med pa'i 'khor lo 'di bkod na gnas pa dang rgyu ba dang yan lag las skyes pa dang sbyar ba las byung ba'i dug rnams lag pa'i mthil bstan pa tsam gyis
[\[22b.4\]]bdud rtsir byed cing zla ba'i 'od ltar dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'bar bas dug sna tshogs kyis brgyal ba yang slong bar byed do/_/bdud rtsi bcud kyis len gsungs te/_bdud rtsi za ba la sogs pa'o/_/dug tu byed do zhes bya ba ni 'bad pa med par gang du sngags nag por byas pa nyid kyis
[\[22b.5\]]so/_/yang na ku ba khan de'i sa bon blangs la sbrul nag po'i zhag gis byugs te/_za ba mar ngo'i gza' ma rungs pa la dgongs ka'i dus su sbrul nag po'i thod par bzhi mdo'i sas bkang la btsugs nas skyes bu'i khu ba'i thig le byas nas gang la bltas pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba
[\[22b.6\]]dang btung ba la sogs pa rnams kha zhing sngags dang bcas pa ni dug tu 'gyur la 'dod na rnal mar 'gyur ro/_/zla ba zhes bya ba chang ngo /_/'o ma zhes bya ba 'o ma'i btung ba'o/_/zla ba'i 'od ltar dri ma med pa'i bsam gtan tsam gyis so/_/yang na shing arka dkar po dang me sbar
[\[22b.7\]]la pad+ma'i snal ma phra mo phye mar byas te/_'o ma dang lan mang du btags te sngags kyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du dbul nas de'i thal ba blangs la tsing ka'i khu bas sbrus te/_grib ma la lan bdun gyi bar du bskam par bya'o/_/de nas mchod pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]sor mo'i nang bkang la chang gi snod kyi nang du thal ba blugs la 'o ma dang kun da dang /_zla ba ltar dri ma med par 'gyur ro/_/rtog pas rmongs pa'i sems can rnams la las 'di spyad par bya'o/_/ji ltar ku su ma'i me tog bskams pa'i phye ma la dzam bi ri 'bras bu'i khu bas
[\[23a.2\]]lan mang du sbrus la ba'i gcin gyis spangs nas pad+ma'i snod du blugs pas ni'o ma dang chang dang 'dra bar byed do/_/tsher ma dang bcas pa'i ka rany+dza'i 'bras bu'i phye ma dang nA ri'i pags pa dang bcas pas/_ltag pa la sogs pa la byugs na dri 'phrog par byed do/_/de ltar
[\[23a.3\]]me tog dang shing dang 'bras bu la sogs pa thams cad kyi dri 'phro'o/_/me tog sna tshogs pa la phan tshun du bdug pa la sogs pas bdugs pa'am bsregs na/_gang du 'dod pa dri bro bar byed do/_/nam mkha' lding gi gdon gyis 'gro ba 'byin par byed cing
[\[23a.4\]]zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'khor lo de nyid klu rnams spangs shing zla bas nye bar brgyan pa la lha'i bu mo dang skyes pa gnyis kyi ming dang spel la skar ma rgyal gyi dus su go ro tsa nas bris la mchod pa chen po byas te bzung la bdag nyid dpal he ru ka'i bdag nyid du sbyor zhing /_
[\[23a.5\]]rang gi rig ma ni rdo rje phag mos yongs su brtags pa gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas mtshan thog thag rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas pa byas na rang nyid 'ongs te 'dus pa ni bud med dang 'dus pa zhes bya'o/_/rig ma las rdul rang byung ste bud med rnams
[\[23a.6\]]kyang 'dus par 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' lding gi gdong gis 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni/_go bzlog 'dug stangs kyis shin tu rgyas pa'i pad+ma'i nang du chud pa'i khrag dang bcas pa'i rtsa kha bye ba las 'byin par byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi rigs su
[\[23a.7\]]'gyur bas mi mchog ste dpal dang ldan zhing mtshan dri ma med par 'gyur ro/_/de'i lag mthil na yod pa'i dpal gang gis kyang 'phrogs mi nus te/_'byung po thams cad kyi mchod gnas su 'gyur bas 'khor los sgyur ba dang mnyam par dpal dang ldan zhing tshe dang nad med par phun
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]sum tshogs pas mtshan pa'o/_/dran pa tsam gyis gsod par byed do zhes bya ba la 'khor lo de nyid nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du chud par dug dang lan tshwa dang ske tshes bris la dur khrod kyi thal ba dang sol bas gzugs brnyan byas la snying gar bcug la bsgrub bya dran bzhin du bkug ste bcug
[\[23b.2\]]la dur khrod du sbas nas mi'i rus pa'i phur bus snying gar btab nas chu tshan blugs la khro bas sngags bzlas na nyi ma bdun gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/gtum mo sbar ba 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas lho phyogs kyi rlung gis brdabs shing bus na gang yin pa der me skyed par
[\[23b.3\]]byed do zhes pa'o/_/rtse gcig pa'i rdo rje gsor zhing sngags bzlas pas ni sa 'og pa rnams 'joms par byed do/_/lag pa'i mthil du mngon par bsngags nas rlung gi rjes su bsnun na gang du 'dod pa der ser ba 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa tsam gyis glog skyed par byed do zhes bya
[\[23b.4\]]ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o/_/dur khrod kyi sol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zla ba mar ngo'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la ro bsregs pa'i me la shing arka bsregs la da du ra'i khu bas me bsad nas sol ba des dug dang lan tshwar bcas pas dur khrod ras la nyi ma'i dbus su chud pa'i
[\[23b.5\]]'khor lo bris nas dur khrod kyi thal bas gzugs brnyan byas te/_de'i snying gar ming dang spel ba bcug la dgug pa la sogs pa byas la gu gul chen pos bdugs nas gang gi ming nas bzung ste/_sngags kyis lan cig bzlas te bsnun na de'i mod la ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[23b.6\]]'khor lo de nyid sa kwa ta ka'i smyu gus sha za'i snying gar cho ga bzhin du bris la ji skad gsungs pa'i thal bsngags dang bcas pas gang gi ming nas smos te bsnun na de sha zas gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/dur khrod kyi sol ba zhes bya ba la gong du bstan pa'i sol bas 'byung po'i nyin zhag
[\[23b.7\]]gi mtshan mo la spang leb bam rtsig pa'i ngos sam dben pa'i gnas gang yang rung bar gza' rnams kyi phyag mtshan gyi dbus su 'khor lo la bsgrub bya'i ming du spel ba bres nas gu gul chen pos bdugs na de gzas bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/slar gso ba la ni de dag thams cad
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]la yang nan tan du 'o mas bkru zhing zhi ba'i yid kyis bzlas par bya'o/_/a ti muk+ta'i lcug ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la tsan+dan dmar po'i rdul las bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas la dur khrod kyi ras la ro'i sen rtsi dang ro tsa na las sngon du gsungs pa'i 'khor
[\[24a.2\]]lo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bris te snying gar bcug la dri'i chus khrus byas nas dgug pa la sogs pa bya zhing /_a ti muk+ta'i lcug ma la/_bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel ba'i sngags lan bdun bzlas nas gang la bsnun na dga' ba chen po'i mdog dmar zhing gcer bu skra grol ba
[\[24a.3\]]myos shing byang chub kyi sems rgyun du 'bab pa rnga mo la zhon pa dbugs kyi zhags pas bkug ste/_rkang pa dag gi mdun du 'gyil bar bsam mo/_/nyi ma bdun yongs su rdzogs pas rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/mi ro'i thod tshal la ldong ros dang /_yung bas gang
[\[24a.4\]]gi ming dang spel ba'i 'khor lo nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bris nas dur khrod dam lam gyi bzhi mdor khru gang tsam du brkos te/_kha sbub tu sbas la gseg ma la lan bdun bzlas nas bsnun te/_de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bcings par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe bgrod 'dod
[\[24a.5\]]pa de'i tshe yang tshub mas khyer ba'i shing lo la mchi ma dang khwa'i khrag dang bya rog gi sgro'i rtsa ba la smyu gus ming dang bcas par bris nas gyen du ldang ba'i rlung la bskur na gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes so/_/rengs pa gso ba la ni phyung nas bkru bar bya'o/_/ra nag po'i yan
[\[24a.6\]]lag lnga dang til mar chen po dang gu gul chen po rnams cha bsnyams la chang gis sbrus te mchod pa'i dus su lan cig bzlas te bdug par sbyar na de bsnams pa tsam gyi mod la 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/yang dur khrod kyi ras la shing a sho ka'i smyu gus klu rnams spangs pa'i
[\[24a.7\]]'khor lo de nyid la bris la yi ge e'i dbus su rak+Sha zhes bya ba'i ming dang spel bar byas nas yang dag par mchod cing de khyim gyi phyogs gcig tu bzhag na lus srul po thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo de nyid du dur khrod kyi ras la bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel te
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]bris nas bud med kyi ro bsregs pa'i thal pa dang tsan+dan dmar po'i rdul du bsres pas bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas la dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas snying gar bcug nas yang dag par mchod de ka ra bI ra'i lcug ma bsgrub bya'i lag pa'i tshad tsam bud med ro bsregs pa'i
[\[24b.2\]]'bar ba'i me la bskyur la ji srid ma tshig par de myur du blangs te rig pa'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas nas gang zhig dran bzhin bskor na de 'gugs par byed/_ltor bsnun na mngal 'pho bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rkang pa brgyad pa yi/_/sngags kyi las mchog bshad par bya/_/
[\[24b.3\]]nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/_/sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yi/_/dbus su bde chen 'khor lo bri/_/'dab brgyad pad+ma ge sar ldan/_/rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo yi/_/phreng bas gsum bskor dbus su ni/_/sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng bskor
[\[24b.4\]]nas/_/'od zer tshogs ni spo bya ste ste/_/'on kyang dkar dmar sngo rnam pa/_/las kyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa/_/dbus su dpa' bo'i snying po dang /_/ji ltar bstan zhing bsgrub bya'i ming /_/de lta bu yi cho gas bri/_/'di ni srung ba chen po ste/_/srung ba kun gyi dam pa yin/_/rims
[\[24b.5\]]dang lto ba na ba dang /_/dug gi nad dang mkha' 'gro nye bar 'tshe ba dang /_gza'i gnod pa dang /_bdud dang /_log 'dren dang /_gang dag lus srul po la sogs pa dag grib ma la yang 'da' bar mi nus na de'i lus la lta ci smos/_/zla gzugs 'dra ba'i yi ge blta/_/phyogs bcur

[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]'di ni rnam spangs pas/_/de ni 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur/_/dper na la la 'bras 'dod pas/_/phub ma rdung bar byed dang mtshungs/_/de ni ngal ba don med de/_/'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/de phyir mchog 'dod gang yin pas/_/'bad de rdo rje slob

[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas gnas pa ste/_bsrub bya srubs pa'i sbyor bas 'dod chags kyi me 'bar bas zhu bar gyur par blta'o/_/de'i 'od zer las nges par 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rdo rje'i glus yang dag par bskul bar bsams te/_oM hUM a ma hA su kha a la la la ho/_

[\[25b.6\]]gsum dang zangs gri dang cang te'u rnams ni phyag g.yas na'o/_/g.yon pas ni zhags pa dang thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga dang sdigs mdzub bo/_/thod pa'i phreng bas dpa' bo dbu bcings shing /_spyi bor mtho ba zla ba phyed pas ral ba bcings te/_sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bsnams

[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]g.yon pas 'khyud cing thod pa thogs pa g.yas pa rdo rje gdengs pa dang sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o/_/'dab ma rnams la ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'o/_/'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la ni rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa dang /_khwa'i gdong ba la sogs pa nas gshin

[\[26a.3\]]rnams ni g.yon skor gyis phyogs kyis so/_/sngo skya dang ser po dang ljang gu dang ser po ni g.yas skor gyis mtshams na gnas pa'o/_/thod pa'i dum bu can dang rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams ni phyag bzhi pa'o/_/rnal 'byor ma rnams ni phyag gnyis pa'o/_/rdo rje dang

[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]dang dkar po ni phyogs dang mtshams kyi'o/_/oM shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT/_DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra swA hA/_thugs kyi mkha' 'gro'i'o/_/oM haM b+ha ga d+ha ka A ro li ka DA ki ni dzA la sam+ba ra hUM phaT swA hA/_pad+ma mkha' 'gro'i snying po'i'o/_/oM A ro li ka dziM hUM phaT/_nye ba'i snying
[\[26b.2\]]po'o/_/oM pad+ma DA ki nI hrIH hUM phaT swA hA/_oM sarba pad+ma DA ki nI ye AH hUM phaT swA hA/_lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/_/oM shrI DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra ru lu ru lu b+h+rUM hUM phaT swA hA/_oM b+h+rUM aM b+h+rUM hUM phaT/_sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/_/oM bu d+d+ha DA ki nI

[\[26b.4\]]gis yang dang yang byugs la tshes brgyad kyi skar ma rgyal la nyi ma tsha ba'i dus su gzhi la gzugs par bya ste/_gsang ba'i zhing sa zhag dang khrag gis bran pa dang de'i thod par bkug ste/_bskyed la smin pa'i sa bon ci rigs pa blangs te/_blo dang ldan pas mar khu'i

[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]gis rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi bkas snying ga dang mgor brdegs la/_nga rgyal gyis sngags bzlas shing dril bu sgra drag tu dkrol nas skye gnas kyi phyag rgya bdag gi dpral bar bzhag pa bstan par bya'o/_/de'i tshe ro'i lus la bgegs sna tshogs 'byung

[\[27a.3\]]'byor mkha' la spyod pa grub pa byin cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/de nas de'i lus la 'dzags pa'i mar khu blangs la ku ba la sogs pa gang yang rung bar blugs nas rkang mthil du byugs na nam mkha' la spyod pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur ro/_/yang sbur ter gyi
[\[27a.4\]]sa bon la nya skyogs su byi dang ka'i khu ba dang khrag gis yang dang yang du sbags la gang yin pa'i thod par dur khrod kyi sas bkang bar bcug nas gtor ma dang mchod pa la sogs pa sngon bstan pa bzhin du ci rigs par byas la yongs su smin pa'i sa bon blangs la khar
[\[27a.5\]]bcug na byar 'gyur ro/_/de la sogs pa'i sa bon khrag dang zhag gis yang dang yang du sbags shing sha dang rus phye'i bdug pas bdugs la de'i thod par bskyed de dus su smin pa'i 'bras bu blangs la khar bcug na de 'dra ba'i gzugs su mthong zhing tshe dang nad med pa
[\[27a.6\]]phun sum tshogs par byed la de ltar khwa dang ce sbyang dang khra dang rma bya dang khyim bya la sogs pa'i gzugs su byed do/_/kha nas bton na ni snga ma bzhin no/_/zla ba mar ngo'i skar ma rgyal dang /_gza' nyi ma la li ta la'i sa bon blangs te/_yang zla ba mar ngo'i gza' nyi ma
[\[27a.7\]]la gcer bus ma du lung ga'i sa bon blangs la gang yang rung ba de'i yan lag gi mchog tu bcug la sha las bskyed par bya'o/_/rus pa'i snying po mar khu dang pags pa dang rus par bcas pas rig ma'i phyag brgyan te/_bdag nyid thal bas byugs nas de la blugs
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]par byas na 'bu srin la sogs pa'i nye bar 'tshe bas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/'khrul 'khor gyi cho ga sngags dang ldan pas chu dron gyis mkhas pas rtag tu bkru bar bya'o/_/gshin rje mthar byed dang bgegs mthar byed sngags kyis mngon par bzlas pa'i bya ba dang
[\[27b.2\]]bcas pas sha za la gtor ma sbyin no/_/gzhan du bton te khyer bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags kyis ni gzugs la mA ma kI'i snying pos bkru bar bya'o/_/sgrol ma yis ni bskyed cing /_de bzhin du gos dkar mos ni bsrung bar bya'o/_/de ltar na skyon med
[\[27b.3\]]cing bskyed na grub pa'i rdzas su gdon mi za'o/_/de bas ni de'i sa bon sngar bstan pa bzhin du blangs la lcags gsum gyis dkri bar bya'o/_/ma sha gsum dang ra ti phyed dang brgyad ni nyi ma'i tshad do/_/ma sha bzhi dang ra ti phyed dang gsum ni zla ba'i tshad do/_/ma sha gsum
[\[27b.4\]]dang ra ti phyed dang lnga ni sreg byed kyi tshad do/_/de ltar go rims bzhin du nyi ma dang zla ba sreg byed rnams kyi ril bu dkris na blo dang ldan pas khar bcug na sped par byed do/_/'jig rten gsum dang zla ba nyi mas mi mthong la kha nas bton na ni slar mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/yang lcags gsum
[\[27b.5\]]gyis ma dkris par khar bcug na ni/_de ma thag tu ma du lung ga'i gzugs su 'gyur la bton na ni grol bar 'gyur ro/_/tshig 'phrog par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngags grub pa ste gzhan du ni ma yin no/_/de nas sngags kyi 'khor lo ni/_/cho ga las kyi mchog yin
[\[27b.6\]]te/_nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni/_/sngags pas li khri'i mdog 'dra zhing /_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/_/de yi dbus dgod pad+ma ni/_/bcu drug 'dab mas brgyan pa ste/_/de dbus 'dab brgyad ge sar ldan/_/bcu drug 'dab ma'i shar phyogs la/_/
[\[27b.7\]]oM shI he he ru ru kaM badzra DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra/_dbus su ra dang hUM hUM phaT/_/phyogs rnams su ni g.yon skor ro/_/phyogs mtshams su ni thod pa ste/_/lte bar swA hA dang spel ba'i/_/bsgrub bya'i ming ni bri bar bya/_/dbus ni sna tshogs rdo rje phreng /_/phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng gis
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]bskor/_/'od dmar 'bar bas rnam brgyan par/_/yi dgas sen rtsi'i khu ba dang /_/tsan+dan dmar bo bsres pa yis/_/yan lag 'od med kyis brgyan zhing /_/gcer bur gyur pas rang gis bri/_/ma mo'i khyim mnyam yid 'ong bar/_/shin tu 'jam po'i
[\[28a.2\]]stan gnas shing /_/lha yi rnal 'byor dmigs nas su/_/skye gnas phyag rgya de nas bcing /_/bsgrub bya la ni mngon phyogs te/_/sngags bas brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas/_/tsan+dan dmar po'i rdul las ni/_/bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs byas la/_/de yi lte bar 'khor lo gzhug_/_
[\[28a.3\]]skye gnas nas ni skud pa dbyung /_/yang na sna yi bug nas/_/phyag rgya ldan pas mthe chung bskyod/_/skud ba bzung nas dus gsum du/_/yid la gnas pa'i 'khor lo bskyod/_/bram ze gsod kyang nyin bdun gyis/_/grub pa nyid du the tshom med/_/yang na tsha ba gsum byug
[\[28a.4\]]la/_/spra tshil gyis kyang rab tu byug_/zangs ma'i khab kyis skye gnas dbug_/seng ldeng 'dab ma du med la/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas kyang /_/blo dang ldan pas nyin bdun gyis/_/bsgrub bya nges par 'gugs par 'gyur/_/de nas mi bdag bu mo sogs/_/'khor
[\[28a.5\]]dang bcas pa'i ming bris la/_/bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes la/_/tsan+dan dmar po nyid dang ni/_/dur khrod zas lhag thal ba rnams/_/sngags pas gcig tu byas nas ni/_/seng ldeng mdag me du med la/_/rdul gnyis lag gnyis kyis mnyes nas/_/sngags dang ldan pa'i
[\[28a.6\]]sbyin sreg bya/_/de yi thal bas bsgrub bya yi/_/gzugs byas 'khor lo'i snying gar gzhug_/spra tshil gyis ni byugs la bsro/_/ci nas spra tshil ma zhu bar/_/nyi ma bdun du bsgrub byas na/_/lha yi 'jig rten 'ong 'gyur na/_/skye bo phal pa smos ci dgos/_/myos shing
[\[28a.7\]]rmongs nas brgyal gyur nas/_/rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur/_/'dis ni bcings par yang bya ste/_/thod pa skam po la ldong ros dang yung bas ming dang bsres pa'i 'khor lo bris la dur khrod dam lam gyi bzhi mdor sbas na/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bcings par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bcu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pas skye ba bdun pa la sogs pa'i phyugs bzung ba ste skye ba gzhan gyis bar mchod pa'o/_/de'i
[\[28b.2\]]mtshan nyid ni le'u bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa las ston pas 'dir ma brjod pa'o/_/dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bcu gcig pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o//_//de nas nye ba'i snying po bshad/_/ces bya ba ni/_oM hrIHha ha hUM hUM phaT te dgug
[\[28b.3\]]pa la sogs pa'i don gyi las rnams bsdus pa'i snying po'o/_/'dab ma drug pa'i pad+ma yi/_/ge sar ze 'brus mtshan pa ste/_/zla bas nye bar mdzes byas shing /_/rdo rje phreng ba bzang pos brgyan/_/de yi phyi rol 'khor lo ni/_/zla ba'i 'od 'dra dri med bri/_/pad+ma drug la rig pa che/_/
[\[28b.4\]]yi ge g.yon nas bskor ba bri/_/bdud kyi las kun zlog byed pa'i/_/'khor lo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'o/_/'khor lo de yi rtsibs la yang /_/rnal 'byor ma drug snying po ste/_/dbus su bdun pa he ru ka_/_dur khrod sen rtsi ro tsa na/_/rang gi khu ba bcas pas bri/_/kha nas
[\[28b.5\]]gsang sngags rgyal po zlos/_/rjes chags phyogs su lag brkyang ste/_/bsgrub bya mdun du bsams nas ni/_/rnal 'byor snyoms par 'jug pa yi/_/rjes su chags pas bsgrub byas na/_/lha yi 'jig rten 'ong 'gyur te/_/skye bo phal pa smos ci dgos/_/yang na
[\[28b.6\]]tsan+dan dmar po dang /_/ske tshe lan tshwa de bzhin te/_/bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes sa dang ni/_/gcig tu byas nas btab par bya/_/de yi gzugs byas grog la/_/'khor lo bris nas snying gar gzhug_/gang gi ming smos bzlas nas su/_/bsgoms na nges par 'gugs par
[\[28b.7\]]'gyur/_/sgrub pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/sa yi bdag po nyid dang ni/_/nor dang skye bo dbang du 'gyur/_/skems shing zhes bya ba ni nus pa dang ldan pa'o/_/'di chu la yongs su bzlas la zhes bya ba ni lag pa la 'khor lo bsgoms pas so/_/mi'i khrag dang zhes bya ba ni dpa'
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]bo'i ro de nyid kyi'o/_/snod du zhes bya ba ni thod par ro/_/nyan mig ces bya ba la nyan zhes bya ba rna ba'o/_/de la reg pa tsam gyis mig rno bar 'gyur te/_'di ni gling mtha' nas rnyed pa'o/_/khrag dang zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo'i snying gi khrag dang ste/_yang dang yang du
[\[29a.2\]]bsgos la grib ma la bskams pa'o/_/lcags gsum zhes bya ba sngar bstan pa bzhin no/_/lhag par gnas par byas la zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o/_/dpal he ru ka'i zhal du bcug la zhes bya ba ni/_ro'i steng du dur khrod la sogs dben pa'i gnas
[\[29a.3\]]su tshon sna lngas dkyil 'khor bris la/_de'i dbus su bsgrub par bya ba ste/_gu gul gyis bdug par bya'o zhes bya'o/_/nye ba'i snying po'i sngags 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsal lo/_/yang na nyi ma phyed na khro zhing nga rgyal gyis non pa'i sems kyis dur khrod kyi ras
[\[29a.4\]]sam/_shing arka'i 'dab ma la mi'i rus pa'i smyu gus sngar bstan pa'i sol ba dang dug la sogs pa drag po'i rdzas kyis ji ltar bstan pa'i 'khor lo bris la/_dur khrod kyi thal bas bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas te snying gar bcug nas/_ske tshes byugs la yang dang
[\[29a.5\]]yang du bsro bar byas na lus tsha bas btab ste sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur ro/_/de ro bsregs pa'i sa la sbas la mi rus kyi phur bus snying gar btab la tshigs thams cad tsher mas bkang ste/_snying gar chu tshan blugs na sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong nas 'chi bar
[\[29a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/yang na mi ro'i khar skyes pa'i yungs kar gyi 'bras bu blangs nas gang gi ming nas smos te gzugs brnyan la bsnun na de de'i mod la 'chi ba'am lus rims kyis 'debs par 'gyur zhing /_'o mas bkrus na slar yang thar bar 'gyur ro/_/dur khrod kyi ras la yung
[\[29a.7\]]ba'am ldong ros kyis 'khor lo bris la tsan+dan dmar po'i rdul dang /_ske tshe dang lan tshwa dang de bzhin du bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes kyi rdul dang gcig tu byas pa'i phye ma lcags phye dang bsres la/_ras kyis phur la lam gyi bzhi mdor sor brgyad tsam brkos la dgra'i ming dang bcas
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]par lan bdun bzlas nas sbas na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bcings par 'gyur ro/_/bton nas 'o mas bkrus na slar rnal mar 'gyur ro/_/sme sha can gyi ro bsregs pa'i thal bas bsgrub bya'i gzugs byas nas gang yin pa'i ming dang 'khor lo bris nas snying gar bcug ste
[\[29b.2\]]de nyid kyi thal bas lan bdun bzlas nas bsnun na de'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes so/_/rims kyis thebs par bya ba la ni/_yi dgas kyi snying gar gang zhig gi ming dang spel nas 'khor lo bris pa de des thebs par 'gyur ro/_/lto na bar bya ba la ni yi dgas kyi
[\[29b.3\]]glad pa la bya'o/_/brjed byed la ni rlung dang sprin gyi 'khor lo bya'o/_/gzer gdab pa la ni mdud rtse gsum pa la'o/_/dug dang mdze nad la ni lto 'phye la'o/_/gza' gang yin pa'i mtshan ma'i nang du chud par bris na des 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin sreg gi me'i thal ba
[\[29b.4\]]zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'i sman gyi sbyin sreg gi thal bas gzugs byas la de'i snying gar 'khor lo bcug nas gang gi ming nas smos te bsnun na de lha nyid kyis kyang mi mthong ngo /_/chu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gtor na slar yang snang bar 'gyur ro/_/thod pa kha
[\[29b.5\]]sbyar gyi phyag rgya la zhes bya ba la khyi smyon pa'i thod pa kha sbyar gyi nang du gzhug par bya ste/_gang zhig gi ming dang spel ba'i 'khor lo smyo byed lnga dang ldan pa dbugs mi 'byin par lan bdun bzlas te bcug nas bcings la rgyas btab nas dur khrod du gang ming dang bcas
[\[29b.6\]]nas sbas na de smyo bar 'gyur ro/_/de nyid kyis skye bo stong yang smyo bar 'gyur ro/_/bton nas 'o mas bkrus na slar yang grol bar 'gyur ro/_/sman bzang po bsgrubs nas khang stong du song ste lan brgya bzlas la bdag nyid kyi spyi bor bcings na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste
[\[29b.7\]]sgra ji bzhin par bstan te go sla'o/_/gzhan gyi dpung mngon du phyogs pa ni zhes bya ba la/_ldong ros sam yung bas lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil du 'khor lo 'di bris la lan stong du yongs su bzlas te khu tshur bcangs nas gzhan gyi dpung mngon par phyogs pa na yul du
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]'jug par bya'o/_/yang na zangs ma'i glegs mal ldong ros kyis sat+ta ka s+ya rak+Sha sarba a yud ni ba ra NaM zhes bya ba dang spel nas bris la cho ga bzhin mchod la sbra tshil gyis g.yogs la lan stong du bzlas te lag pa g.yon par bzung la khu tshur bcangs
[\[30a.2\]]la/_gsang sngags rgyal po brjod bya zhing /_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan nas/_/ji srid khu tshur ma grol bar/_/mtshon cha thams cad bcings par 'gyur/_/dgra bo gal te lag na ni/_/mtshon cha 'phyar bar byed pa yang /_/ji srid khu tshur ma grol bar/_/mtshon
[\[30a.3\]]cha gtong bar mi nus so/_/de nas sman mchog bshad bya ste/_/mtshon cha lnga ni bzlog phyir ro/_/'khrul 'khor gyis 'phen mi 'phen dang /_/de bzhin lag pas 'phen pa dang /_/'phangs nas de ni 'dzin nyid dang /_/lag pas mtshon cha 'gyed dang lnga/_/'jig rten gsum po
[\[30a.4\]]ma lus na/_/mtshon cha rnams ni 'di dag go/_/lag pas 'phen pa 'khor lo brjod/_/'khrul 'khor gyis 'phen mda' la sogs/_/'phangs nas gzung bzhags sogs te/_/lag pa'i mtshon cha stobs 'gyed pa/_/mi 'phen ral gri sogs gnas pa/_/'khor lo sman ni
[\[30a.5\]]legs mthong gis/_/mda' la sogs pa ni a kar na bi d+ha ka kas so/_/zhags pa la sogs pa'i dbyig pa ni ut+palas so/_/lag pa'i mtshon cha ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar pos so/_/ral gri la sogs pa ni smyo byed kyis so/_/sman bzang po de rnams nyi ma bzang
[\[30a.6\]]po la blangs nas bdud rtsi lngas bsgos la sme sha can gyi bu mo sngon mo'i me tog gis byugs nas mang ro'i chos brgyad dam bcu bzhi la bram ze'i thod pa ro bsregs pa'i sas bkang bar bcug la/_ji skad bstan pa bzhin du chu blugs pa dang gtor ma sbyin pa la sogs pa
[\[30a.7\]]byas nas smin pa'i lcug ma bzang po skar ma rgyal dang gza' nyi ma la blangs la mnyam par gzhag pas sa lam lhung bar sngags kyi rgyal pos shin tu bsrungs la/_de dag thams cad lhan cig tu g.yon skor gyis bsgril la skud pa byas la mgrin pa'am mgo bor bcings
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]na mtshon cha slar bzlog cing mi tshugs par 'gyur la thams cad mtshon cha brgyas bsnun kyang gnod pa'i tshor ba mi 'byung zhing mtshon gyis mi chod la rdo rje'i lus su 'gyur ro/_/yang na dpa' chen gcig nyid kyis/_/mtshon cha thams cad zlog byed pa/_/pin ta kar zhes bya ba'i/_/
[\[30b.2\]]sman chen rnyed par gyur nas ni/_/sngags pas nyi ma bzang po la/_/de yi 'bras bu yongs smin pa/_/sngon bstan rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/bram ze'i thod par sa bon gzugs/_/de nas shing smin pa dang gza' nyi ma la nyi ma shar ba'i dus su de'i rtsa ba phra mo rnams kha byang du phyogs
[\[30b.3\]]pas blangs nas sa la ma lhung bar bzung ste ji ltar bstan pa'i rim pas phrag pa dang spyi bor bzung na/_rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad rmongs par 'gyur ro/_/yang de'i ge sar zho dang lhan cig bza' ste/_ji srid mgrin par lud kyi bar du dpa' bos bza'o/_/de ji srid ma zhu ba de
[\[30b.4\]]srid du rdo rje 'dzin pa dang 'dra ba'i lus su 'gyur te/_de la mtshon chas phog kyang chu'i thigs pa ltar gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/yang na sngon gyi go cha'i rim pa'i sngags pas bram ze'i thod bar bcugs pa'i a shwat+tha'i rtsa ba blangs la cho ga bzhin du ril bu bya'o/_/nyi ma zla ba
[\[30b.5\]]sreg byed pa'i/_/so so'i cha la gnas pa yi/_/lcags gsum gyis ni dkris byas pa'i/_/ril bu kha ru gzhug par bya/_/de nas dpa' bo chen pos mtshon cha thams cad bzlog cing rims dang /_lto na ba dang /_dug dang /_mkha' 'gro'i gnod pa dang /_gza' rnams de'i
[\[30b.6\]]dri tshor ba tsam gyis rab tu 'bros te/_seng ge'i dris glang po che 'bros pa bzhin no/_/yang pe ta'i sa bon bram ze'i klad pa la cho ga bzhin du btsugs la sman bzang po blang bar bya ste/_skar ma rgyal dang gza' nyi ma dang zla ba la mchod pa dang gtor ma byas na phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i
[\[30b.7\]]sgrub pa po lha'i rnal 'byor gyis sngags zlos pas snga ma bzhin gcer bu skra grol bar gyur pa mnyam par gzhag pas mtha' dag btus te/_rnal 'byor ma'i lag par thod pa sa lam lhung bar gzhag go/_/de nas dum bu bdun byas la skud pa dkar pos dkris nas gang gi
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]spyi bor bzung na sa stengs na ji snyed pa'i mtshon cha du ma rnams brlag bar 'gyur te/_dper na nyi mas mun pa bzhin no/_/de nas 'dam gyi cho ga bshad/_/nag po chen po sman chen po/_/rgyal dang nyi ma la btsal nas/_/mchod dang gtor ma yang dag ldan/_/

[\[31a.3\]]yis lus ni bsku bar bya/_/ji srid lus la gnas kyi bar/_/de srid mtshon chas chod mi 'gyur/_/dug kyang lus la mi 'phog ste/_/bdag nyid chen pos sman bza'o/_/yang ku mA ri blangs la gzhon nu ma'i rkang rjes kyi sa dang ldan par byas la lug gi rwa dang cha

[\[31a.5\]]pa can de phyi nas ni gzhan bya'o/_/de nas sba bya dpa' chen pos/_/dpa' bo thams cad mchod byas te/_/mngal nas dang po phyung ba ni/_/ma yi nu zho ma 'thungs par/_/shi ba'i ro ni rnyed nas ni/_/he ru ka dpal gnyis med mchod/_/gtor ma mnyam par gzhag pas
[\[31a.6\]]bsrung /_/ltag pa nas ni gshags nas su/_/de yi lce ni blang bar bya/_/b+h+ring+ga ra dza du du ra/_/kaM kaM dza ga gzhan mi thub/_/rgyal dang nyi ma la blangs nas/_/lnga po rnams dang ldan pa ni/_/btags te ril bu byas nas su/_/grib ma la ni bskams nas kyang /_/lcags
[\[31a.7\]]gsum gyis ni dkri bar bya/_/ra ti phyed brgyad ma sha gsum/_/ra ti phyed gsum ma sha bzhi/_/ra ti lnga dang ma sha gsum/_/rim pa bzhin du dkri bar bya/_/dkris nas yang dag mchod byas la/_/stong du bzlas te khar bcug na/_/ji srid kha nas gnas pa ru/_/sa gnas
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]mtshon cha du ma yang /_/bltas ba tsam gyis 'jig 'gyur te/_/dper na 'bar mes rtswa bzhin no/_/rims dang lto nad dug dang ni/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi gnod pa dang /_/gza' rnams thams cad zlog byed pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' bzhin no/_/de nas gzhan yang bshad
[\[31b.2\]]bya ba/_/sems can thams cad rab rmongs pa/_/rgyal gyi nyin par nan tan du/_/nags kyi ras bal blangs nas su/_/bu mo gzhon nu'i skud pas bya/_/g.yon phyogs su ni bkal nas su/_/sum sgril du ni skud pa bya/_/rtsa ba'i sngags ni stong phrag brgyang /_/mngon par
[\[31b.3\]]bzlas shing btags nas ni/_/mdud pa byas nas lag g.yon gyis/_/de ru ma mo rnams ni brtag_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi gnyis med pa/_/'gog pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas te/_/yang dag mchod pa byas nas su/_/lag pa g.yas pa bcing bar bya/_/mtshon cha thams
[\[31b.4\]]cad zlog byed pa/_/ral gri mda' sogs gzhan du min/_/nags skyes shal ma li yi bal/_/blo dang ldan pas rgyal la blang /_/gzhon nu ma yi lag pa ni/_/sa yis phyi nas bkal bar bya/_/dge ba'i rgyu skar skar ma dang /_/zla ba stobs can dag la ni/_/sngon du
[\[31b.5\]]gsungs pa'i bya ba yis/_/shin tu mnyam gzhag mdud pa bya/_/'di ni yid la gzung byas pas/_/sum cu pas kyang mi 'ching zhing /_/mtshon cha thams cad 'ching 'gyur pas/_/las kyi cho ga blta bar bya/_/de ltar gsang ba'i lta ba las/_/gsang chen gsang
[\[31b.6\]]bas sba bya ste/_/blo dang ldan pas thams cad du/_/skal med sems can la mi sbyin/_/dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bcu gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o//_//de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag tu'o/_/cho ga'i las rnams
[\[31b.7\]]ni/_go rims bzhin du bshad bya ba/_zhes bya ba ni/_oM ha na maHhi swA hA hu bau ShaT he hUM hUM ho phaT haM ste re re zhing ngam sbyor ba'i tshig gi yi ge drug gi gzugs dang dpa' bo'i lha ci rigs par sbyar ro/_/de la cho ga zlos bzhin du/_ya nga ba'i lam du zhugs na zhes bya ba la
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]sogs pa ni zlos bzhin pas yid la ci 'dod pa thams cad byed do zhes pa'o/_/de nas dbus su dpa' bo'i sngags/_/de nyid rig pa'i bsam gtan gyis/_/dpa' bo'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas/_/de yis bya ba kun bya'o/_/de la rim pa 'dis bri bar bya ste/_
[\[32a.2\]]zla ba'i dbus gyur rdo rje ni/_/rtse gsum de bzhin kha drug pa/_/de yi dbus gyur pad+ma ni/_/'dab ma drug la legs gnas pa/_/sngags pas ze'u 'brur bri bar bya/_/ji ltar bstan bzhin bsgrub bya'i ming /_/rdo rje sems sogs sangs rgyas kyis/_/ji ltar go cha'i
[\[32a.3\]]sngags bshad bzhin/_/sngon sngags dbus su bri bya ste/_/gzhan ni pad 'dab la de bzhin/_/ring po drug ni yongs spangs par/_/rdo rje'i lte bar dgod par bya/_/gur gum sen rtsi rang khrag dang /_/ro tsa na yis grog la/_/rgyal dang nyi dus sgrub pa pos/_/cho ga
[\[32a.4\]]bzhin du bri bar bya/_/dus gsum du ni bzlas byas nas/_/mchod chen byas nas gzung bya ste/_/sngags pas lan bdun sngags btab nas/_/gos kyi tha mar bcing bar bya/_/lam du zhugs na rkun po dang /_snag gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur
[\[32a.5\]]ro/_/thams cad du ni bsrung 'gyur te/_/grub pa nyid du the tshom med/_/yang 'khor lo de nyid kyi lte ba la thig le lta bu'i rgyan byas pa'i thig les bskor nas/_bsgrub bya 'khor dang bcas pa mo ha na zhes bya ba'i tshig dang spel la gos kyi tha ma la mdud de/_chos kyi
[\[32a.6\]]dbyings su bsgoms nas zlos bzhin du 'gro na lha dang mi rnams kyis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yang bi sha da ta ka ri'i sa bon bram ze'i thod par cho ga bzhin btsugs la bskyed pa dang /_zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su byang phyogs su zug pa'i rtsa ba blangs la lcags
[\[32a.7\]]gsum gyis dkris te lan stong bzlas na go char 'gyur ro/_/yang na n+ya gro d+ha'i 'bras bu khwa nag pos zos pa'i rtug pa'i 'bras bu blangs nas nyi ma bzang po la/_bram ze'i thod par ro bsregs pa'i sa yis bkang bar btsugs nas bdud rtsi lngas gtor te skyes
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]nas 'dab ma gnyis tsam blangs la lcags gsum gyis dkris la mchod pa rnams kyis mchod nas bsngags te khar bcug na/_lha dang mi rnams kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/go cha bzlas pa'i lag pas gang la reg pa de zhes bya ba la dur khrod kyi
[\[32b.2\]]ras la ba ra ci ta ka'i khu ba blangs la ldong ros dang yung ba'i a shwa ka'i smyu gus 'khor lo thig les mtshan pa bris te phyi nas bsgrub bya dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa'i ming dang spel nas lan stong bzlas nas/_yang bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes kyi rdul dang dur khrod kyi thal
[\[32b.3\]]ba la bsgrub bya'i gzugs byas te/_'khor lo'i snying gar bcug nas me tog ser pos gtor zhing rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la brgyad brgya bzlas nas sbas te/_de'i steng du snying gar gnas pa'i khang pa byas la gang gi ming gzung ba de mdung bzhin du rengs
[\[32b.4\]]par 'gyur te/_sum cu rtsa gsum pas kyang bskyod par mi nus so/_/gzhan gyi dmag tshogs sgrol bar bya ba la ni 'o mas bkus na slar rnal mar 'gyur ro/_/rang gi khrag la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsal lo/_/khro bo'i rgyal po'i rnam par bsgoms la 'di ltar chu'i
[\[32b.5\]]rdul phra rab thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi lhar bskyed pa'i dbu rgyan gyi gzugs kyis ni chu'i steng du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i 'khor lo snyoms par zhugs pa ni lag pa g.yon pa dang g.yas pa gnyis kyis mnyes na rigs drug gi rnal 'byor
[\[32b.6\]]ma dbang du 'gyur ro/_/skar ma rgyal la ras byas la zhes bya ba la sbrul gyi rgyal po rnyed nas dkar po dang nag po'i ri mo thams cad so sor dum bu dum bur bcang la nag po dang dkar po'i dbye bas so sor bya ste/_ras bal gyi sa bon blangs nas dkar po'i zla ba la rgyal
[\[32b.7\]]gyi nyin par dum bu dkar po zhag dang shas bsgos la sa la sbas te gdab po/_/ji ltar nag po'i dum bu'i zhag dang shas kyang sa bon bsgos shing /_zla ba mar ngo'i rgyal gyi nyin par de nyid kyi zhag dang shas sa la yang spag go/_/dkar po dang nag po'i cha'i bye
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]brag gis ji ltar bskyed pa'i ras bal blangs la rgyal gyi nyi ma gzhan la dkar po'i chos bskyed pa'i ras bal la/_rnal 'byor ma ser skyas bkal ba de'i nyin bar thag pa ser skyas btag go/_/de ltar nag po'i chas bskyod pa'i ras bal tshes nag po'i
[\[33a.2\]]skar mo rgyal la rnal 'byor ma sngon mos bkal zhing de nyid kyi nyi ma la thag pa sngon pos ji ltar lus yog par gyur pa de ltar btags par byas la sngon po dang dkar po'i cha yis rgyal gyi nyi ma gzhan la bsgrub par bya ste/_ras la stong phrag sum cu rtsa dgu mngon par bsngags la brgyad
[\[33a.3\]]brgya bzlas shing bdug par bya ste/_a ka ru nag po dang dum bu nag po'i sha dang rus pa zla ba mar ngo la bskyed pa'i ras la bdug go/_/de ltar zla ba mar ngo la bskyed pa'i ras ni dum bu dkar po'i sha dang rus pa dang sang ka puSh+pa dang bcas pas bdug par bya'o/_/de nas
[\[33a.4\]]gus pas bla ma dang dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod la/_lha'i rnal 'byor dmigs te/_rgyal la bsgrub pa'i ras la rnal 'byor ma'i bka' lung gis bsgo bar bya'o/_/de gyon pa'i lus kyis stong phrag bcu bzlas nas 'grub par 'gyur te/_grib ma mi mngon zhing

[\[37b.3\]]pa la dga' dpung pa 'phyang /_/yan lag rtsub cing skra ring ba/_/so sna sen mo 'jam pa ste/_/rkang pa mnyam zhing sna ring la/_/lto ni bum pa ltar sbom zhing /_/bum pa'i 'phyang ba la mdzes pa'i bzhin/_/zhi dang rgyas la'ang sbyar bar bya/_/phur bu ma ni mig g.yo zhing /_/'og mig

[\[37b.5\]]par byed/_/nag po'i las la sbyar bar bya/_/brgyad pa ri dgas ma skal bzang /_/lto ba chung zhing rkang pa chung /_/ri dgas mgrin pa ri dgas mig_/skra ni phra zhing snum pa ste/_/so yang sral mchu snum pa/_/gzugs mdzes thig le lta bu'i byang /_/reg 'jam sred pa mang
[\[37b.6\]]du smra/_/sgra ni bya rog skad lta bu/_/rtag tu gcer bu dbul ba yin/_/sems rtsub pa la sdig la dga'/_/skur 'debs ma de yi dgas rigs/_/dbang gi las la sbyar bar bya/_/'di brgyad du ni rab tu grags/_/thod pa dang dgra sta la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brgyad ni/_ji ltar

[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi go 'phang mchog_/ces bya ba la mchog ni mang po'i rigs te/_mang por 'gyur ba'i rigs rnams so/_/gang yang gsungs pa/_dam pa'i rigs ni rnam pa brgya/_/zhes pa'o/_/rab tu

[\[38a.3\]]brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/zhes bya ba ni mdog dang mtshan ma'i rjes su'o/_/lA ma zhes bya ba ni yid du 'ong ba reg pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ste/_yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/

[\[38a.5\]]du skal bzang bzhag nas ni/_/pad+ma rab tu rgyas par bya/_/myur du gnyis gnyis sbyor ba yis/_/mkhas pas rdo rjes rgyas gdab bya/_/rus sbal gyi phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o/_/rus sbal phyag rgya b+ha gar ni/_/thal mo brdeg dang ldan reg bya/_/phyag rgya sngags

[\[38a.7\]]'khyud nas/_/ji ltar skyil krung bcas nas 'khyud/_/ji ltar phyag rgya rtogs 'gyur ba/_/phyag rgya'i lan du brjod pa yin/_/tshes bcu bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o/_/yang na tshes bcu bzhi'i gnas skabs ji ltar rnyed/_pad+ma rnam par rgyas shing 'bar dang ldan/_/

[\[38b.1\]]dpal ldan gang gi sems ni gang mnyam pa/_/de ni pad+ma can gyi mtshan nyid yin/_/mchu gnyis glo zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o/_/mdung zhes bya ba ni ser mo gcig bstan pa'i phyag rgya sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas rdo rje skyil krung gis/_/rang gi rdo rje der gnas pa'o/_/

[\[38b.3\]]he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bcu dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/lag pa g.yon gyi brda rnams te/_/zhes bya ba la brda rnams kyi gnyis ka'i rang bzhin gcig tu gyur nas ming po

[\[39a.1\]]pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o/_/dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o//_//de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/_sgra ji bzhin pa ste go sla'o/_/gzhir ni
[\[39a.2\]]sa gzhi byas nas su/_/zhes bya ba ni stan las ldang ba'o/_/mchod ces bya ba ni dam por 'khyud dang 'o bya ba'o/_/smin ma g.yo zhes bya ba ni/_cung zad ngo tsha ba'i phyir ro/_/rnal 'gyur bskor ba zhes bya ba ni/_phul du byung ba'i bde ba sgrub pa'i don gyis bskor ba ni byang chub kyi sems

[\[39b.1\]]ral gri dang mdung thung ni nas kyi 'bru tshad tsam mo/_/'khor lo dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje rnams ni sran tsa na ka'i tshad tsam ste/_mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rim pas ji lta ba bzhin rang rang gi mtshan ma kha dog lnga po'i nang du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo chud pa la/_sems brtan

[\[40a.1\]]nya ma zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'i mchog lhan cig tu spyod pa'o/_/kun 'gro zhes bya ba ni skal ba ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi don bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir 'o bya ba dang rab tu 'khyud pa la sogs pa thams cad ster bas so/_/rnal 'byor gnas kyi khyad par nyid/_/

[\[40b.1\]]'gyur/_/dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod pa bya/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa sna tshogs pa gsungs pa ste/_rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni/_/rigs rnams thams cad mnyam par sbyar/_/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas/_/nyan pa la sogs dbang po kun/_/bsre zhing bde bar

[\[40b.5\]]'phel byed pas/_/zhes bya ba la 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa nges shing /_byang chub kyi lam la thams cad la khyab pas legs par gnas pa'o/_/dad pa'i nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni/_chos rnams dad pas gzung bya ste/_/shes rab ldan pa'i de nyid rig_/ces pa'o/_/

[\[41a.1\]]thabs kyi gling gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o//_//de nas dpa' bo spyod brtul zhugs/_/zhes bya ba la kun la spyod pas na spyod pa'o/_/brtul zhugs ni rus pa'i rgyan la sogs pa'o/_/dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'o/_/de su

[\[41a.5\]]par mdzad/_/mche ba rab tu gtsigs pa po/_/gtsug na zla ba phyed pa la/_/sna tshogs rdo rje'i ral pas brgyan/_/thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par klubs/_/rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing /_/stag gi pags pas rnam dkris pa/_/phyed krung bcas pas shin tu gnas/_/
[\[41a.6\]]sdang ba thams cad 'dul mdzad pa/_/sred dang rmongs pa phrag dog 'gyur/_/kA la rA Ti 'og tu mnan/_/spyan gsum zhal bzhi mgrin pa bzhi/_/mkha' ltar sngo skya ser dang dmar/_/steng gi zhal ni ljang gu ste/_/rdo rje dril bus snyoms 'jug cing /_/phag mo dang ni gnyis med dga'/_/
[\[41a.7\]]chos kyi 'khor lo khar gsil snod/_/mdung dang zhags pa lcags kyu'i phyag_/de bzhin mgo dang rde'u chung ste/_/phyag gnyis na ni chos gos so/_/mi lpags snam bu gnyis kyis 'phyar/_/phag mo mdog dmar gcer bu la/_/spyan gsum skra ni grol ba ste/_/rgyan rnams thams
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]cad rab 'bar ba/_/g.yon pa ro yi lhung bzed de/_/g.yas pa rde'u chung chos dbyangs sgrogs/_/byin pa gnyis ni mnyam 'khyud cing /_/snying rje dga' ba'i bde ba che/_/shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma la/_/rngon pa mo dang gdol pa ni/_/btso blag mkhan dang puk+ka sI/_/
[\[41b.2\]]shan pa ma dang ri khrod ma/_/de bzhin nya ba sha wa ri/_/ser dang sngo dmar dud kha dang /_/skya bo dang ni dmar dang ljang /_/de bzhin brgyad pa dkar po ste/_/lugs su 'byung dang lugs las bzlog_/bzhad dang zhi dang snying rje dang /_/sgeg dang rngam dang mi sdug pa/_/drag shul
[\[41b.3\]]khro bo'i nyams dang ldan/_/khar gsil dang ni lhung bzed dang /_/rde'u chung dang zangs gri phyag_/sgo bzhir khro mo dgod par bya/_/he ru ka yi rang snang ba/_/rdo rje gtum mo rdo rje'o/_/srin mo rdo rje 'jigs byed ma/_/drag shul gdul dka' kun gsol ma/_/thal ba'i
[\[41b.4\]]mdog dang ljang gu dang /_/dmar dang sngo ba drag shul 'jigs/_/lhung bzed dang ni khar gsil g.yon/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rde'u chung g.yas/_/phrag pa'i steng na chos gos 'phyar/_/kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/_/ro steng

[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang /_brtul zhugs b+hu su ku'i spyod pa'i rim pa 'dis spyad par bya'o/_/de la rim pa ni 'di yin te b+hu zhes bya ba ni za ba ste/_de tsam 'ba' zhig rjes su dran zhing 'du 'dzi thams cad yongs su spangs nas/_dka' thub dang bsnyen gnas
